name: Tea Madnesss
description:
A small game i made ina 2 hours as a challenge, where you need to run a small tea shop by serving customers their tea.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D: move
  • E: interact with tea/sugar dispenser or customers
  • Shift: run

How to play:
Customers will randomly arrive ad each table, with an order for a particular type of tea with a certain amount of sugar.
First, you'll need to brew the tea: interact with one of the two machines behind the counter to start brewing. When the progress bar finishes, an icon appears above your head indicating the type of tea you're holding.
After that, to add sugar to the tea, go to the sugar machine in the top right corner and interact with it to add a single portion of sugar.
When the tea is completed, go to the customer for which you're preparing the order and interact with him/her to serve the tea.

The goal is to serve as many customers as possible in the time limit. Giving a customer the correct type of tea and quantity of sugar gains you points, while serving the wrong order will give you less points or even lose you some.
